name: 365 Sherpas Brussels
membership: Europäische Bewegung Deutschland/ European Movement International
goal: Die Beratung von Unternehmen, Verbänden und Institutionen in allen Bereichen von Public Affairs, Strategie und Kommunikation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: We monitor and advise upon different policy areas, including: data protection, mobility, energy and climate, digital single market, economy and competition and finance.
